theme: Overcoming Creative Block: How to Get the Ball Rolling Again

questions.question: When you can't come up with new ideas or finish creative work.
To overcome a difficult situation or obstacle.
To suddenly feel like you can't move forward with your work.
To solve a problem in a new or unusual way.
To recover quickly from a bad mood or mindset.
To feel trapped doing the same thing over and over.
To try something new without pressure, just for fun.
To start something new like a project or idea.
To stop focusing and start daydreaming or losing attention.
To create motivation or start feeling creative again.
To keep going through something hard, even if itâ€™s slow.
To make a change in routine to find new energy.
To share ideas with someone and get their opinion.
When your ideas or inspiration suddenly disappear.
To stop and look at the situation from a bigger view.
